name: Craft CORE Offroad Short Sleeve Jersey - Men's
description:
A light and stretchy jersey for exploring the road less travelled or no road at all. Sitting in between roadie tight and enduro loose, the Offroad jersey has a comfortable, regular fit that plays well with gravel bike drop bars and mountain bike wide bars.Lightweight recycled polyester wick away moisture.Mesh panels on the sides and under the arms.On-seam zippered pocket fits a multitool and a gel.Dropped hem provides extra coverage in the drop.Gripper elastic at the back hem keeps the jersey in place.Craft’s products tend to fit long and lean. So, if your fit tends to fall between sizes, Craft suggests sizing up.

        Sustainability
